Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The TOPMed acknowledgement statement can be found at: https://topmed.nhlbi.nih.gov/acknowledgements. In addition, please include: "Clinical data and tissue samples were provided by the Pulmonary Hypertension Breakthrough Initiative (PHBI). Funding for the PHBI is provided under NHLBI grant #R24HL123767, and by the Cardiovascular Medical Research and Education Fund (CMREF)."
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There is one consent group for this study: DS-PVD-IRB-COL-NPU. Use of the data must be related to Pulmonary Vascular Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note that only full or expedited IRB approvals will be accepted). Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Pulmonary Vascular Disease, IRB, COL, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-PVD-IRB-COL-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Pulmonary Vascular Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
Please note that only full or expedited IRB approvals will be accepted.

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area (IRB, COL, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: EA-IRB-COL-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use by NHLBI WGS study investigators only. There is one consent group for this study: DS-PVD-IRB-COL-NPU. Use of the data must be related to Pulmonary Vascular Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note that only full or expedited IRB approvals will be accepted). Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
